description.overview: Resilience represents your emotional equilibrium, sense of security, and ability to stay grounded through challenges.
description.detailed: This meter tracks Moon and Saturn transits to your natal Moon and 4th house (emotional foundation). The Moon shows your day-to-day emotional state and reactivity. Saturn brings structure and grounding but can create heaviness. When these planets form supportive aspects, you feel emotionally centered and resilient. Challenging aspects create emotional volatility, insecurity, or a shaky sense of self. Your 4th house (home, roots, foundation) is key to understanding where you find emotional safety.

primary_planets.moon: Emotional state, reactivity, and sense of security
primary_planets.saturn: Emotional structure, boundaries, and long-term stability

secondary_planets.jupiter: Can expand emotional resilience when supportive
secondary_planets.neptune: Can dissolve emotional boundaries for better or worse

key_houses.4: Emotional foundation, home, roots, sense of safety

aspect_weights.conjunction: Maximum emotional impact - intense grounding or destabilization
aspect_weights.opposition: High impact - tension between inner and outer needs
aspect_weights.trine: High flow - emotional ease and natural resilience
aspect_weights.square: Moderate friction - emotional challenges requiring coping
aspect_weights.sextile: Moderate flow - opportunities to build stability

interpretation_guidelines.tone: Validating and supportive - acknowledge real emotional difficulty without minimizing
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_high: Emphasize trusting their resilience, handling challenges well, emotional strength
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_low: Emphasize self-care, asking for support, not judging emotional fragility
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_challenging: Validate that it's genuinely hard right now - offer concrete coping strategies
avoid: Telling them to just be strong

phrasing_examples.high_harmonious: You're emotionally grounded today - your inner stability is strong and you can handle whatever comes your way with confidence.
phrasing_examples.moderate_mixed: You're holding it together but it takes effort - be patient with yourself and take breaks when emotions feel overwhelming.
phrasing_examples.low_challenging: Your emotional foundation feels shaky today - this is real, not weakness. Prioritize self-care and lean on support when you need it.
